page.title: 09SHOOTING SUPLIES LTD
page.content:
Andrew Kay Shooting Suplies LTD
Andrew Kay has two Livery shops.He sells all animal foods.He keeps them in a big new shed that took 29 days to put up.He sells Guns,Cartridges and Clothing.They have two Branches, and the Branch in Sturton employs 4 people.People mostly purchase GunCartridges and Dogfood.The shop is open every day of the week from 8.30pm till 5.00pm.The business is a family business and was started off by himself.He likes his job very much and so do all of his workers.He sells more Guns and Shooting wear in Winter when the Game Season starts.His customers come from far and wide of the District.
